hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: P4_CHANGELIST
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Changelist to be used for checking out the Media SDK sources. If blank then the latest sources will be pulled.

scm.projectOptions: allwrite clobber nocompress unlocked nomodtime rmdir

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
@echo off
echo AMDAPPSDKROOT: %AMDAPPSDKROOT% echo PRODUCT_VERSION: %PRODUCT_VERSION% echo ARTIFACT_PRODUCTVERSION: %ARTIFACT_PRODUCTVERSION% echo BUILD_DISPLAY_NAME: %BUILD_DISPLAY_NAME% echo JOB_NAME: %JOB_NAME%

@echo off setlocal
rem This command will create the source file archive set BUILD_VERSION=%MAJOR_NUMBER%.%MINOR_NUMBER%.%BUILD_NUMBER% pushd "%WORKSPACE%" echo [INFO]Creating the MediaSDK Source archive "%SEVENZ%" a -t7z MediaSDK-Source-%OSTYPE%-%ARTIFACT_PRODUCTVERSION%.7z -r samples\mediaFoundation\ -xr!*.obj -xr!bin -xr!lib -xr!directShow -xr!openVideo -xr!"Generated Files" xr!Release -xr!Debug -xr!*.pch -xr!*.exe -xr!*.lib -xr!*.exp -xr!*.tlog -xr!"samples\mediaFoundation\playbackVqWinStore\Generated Files" -xr!samples\mediaFoundation\playbackVqWinStore\Win32 -xr!samples\mediaFoundation\playbackVqWinStore\x64 -xr!samples\mediaFoundation\playbackVqWinStore\docs -xr!"samples\mediaFoundation\transcodeVqWinStore\Generated Files" -xr!samples\mediaFoundation\transcodeVqWinStore\Win32 -xr!samples\mediaFoundation\transcodeVqWinStore\x64 -xr!samples\mediaFoundation\transcodeVqWinStore\docs -xr!"samples\mediaFoundation\videoEditAmpWinStore\ampTransform\build\Generated Files" -xr!"samples\mediaFoundation\videoEditAmpWinStore\ampTransform\build\Release" -xr!"samples\mediaFoundation\videoEditAmpWinStore\ampTransform\build\x64" -xr!"samples\mediaFoundation\videoEditAmpWinStore\Generated Files" -xr!samples\mediaFoundation\videoEditAmpWinStore\Win32 -xr!samples\mediaFoundation\videoEditAmpWinStore\x64 -xr!samples\mediaFoundation\videoEditAmpWinStore\docs -xr!samples\mediaFoundation\AppPackages -xr!samples\mediaFoundation\x64 -xr!samples\mediaFoundation\imageOverlayOpenCl\build\windows\imageOverlayOpenCl -xr!samples\mediaFoundation\imageOverlayOpenCl\build\windows\mftDx9ColorConvertOpenCl -xr!samples\mediaFoundation\imageOverlayOpenCl\build\windows\mftDx9OverlayOpenCl -xr!samples\mediaFoundation\imageOverlayOpenCl\build\windows\mftDx11ColorConvertOpenCl -xr!samples\mediaFoundation\imageOverlayOpenCl\build\windows\mftDx11OverlayOpenCl -xr!samples\mediaFoundation\svcTranscode\build\windows\customSink -xr!samples\mediaFoundation\svcTranscode\build\windows\mftSvcSplitter -xr!samples\mediaFoundation\svcTranscode\build\windows\svcTranscode -xr!samples\mediaFoundation\videoEditOpenCl\build\windows\mftDx9ResizerOpenCl -xr!samples\mediaFoundation\videoEditOpenCl\build\windows\mftDx11ResizerOpenCl -xr!samples\mediaFoundation\videoEditOpenCl\build\windows\videoEditOpenCl
"%SEVENZ%" u -t7z MediaSDK-Source-%OSTYPE%-%ARTIFACT_PRODUCTVERSION%.7z -r samples\dem\ -xr!bin -xr!lib -xr!directShow -xr!openVideo -xr!Release -xr!Debug -xr!*.pch -xr!*.exe -xr!*.lib -xr!*.exp -xr!*.tlog ::- Default for Media SDK: "%SEVENZ%" u -t7z MediaSDK-Source-%OSTYPE%-%ARTIFACT_PRODUCTVERSION%.7z -r samples\amf\ -xr!bin -xr!lib -xr!\obj -xr!samples\amf\obj -xr!directShow -xr!openVideo -xr!Release -xr!Debug -xr!*.pch -xr!*.exe -xr!*.lib -xr!*.exp -xr!*.tlog ::- Custom for EG VDK only include the pipelineEncoder, pipelinePlayback and common folders ::- "%SEVENZ%" u -t7z MediaSDK-Source-%OSTYPE%-%ARTIFACT_PRODUCTVERSION%.7z -ir!samples\amf\common -ir!samples\amf\pipelineEncoder -ir!samples\amf\pipelinePlayback -xr!bin -xr!lib -xr!\obj -xr!samples\amf\obj -xr!directShow -xr!openVideo -xr!Release -xr!Debug -xr!*.pch -xr!*.exe -xr!*.lib -xr!*.exp -xr!*.tlog "%SEVENZ%" u -t7z MediaSDK-Source-%OSTYPE%-%ARTIFACT_PRODUCTVERSION%.7z -r thirdparty\ -xr!bin -xr!lib -xr!directShow -xr!openVideo -xr!Release -xr!Debug -xr!*.pch -xr!*.exe -xr!*.lib -xr!*.exp -xr!*.tlog
"%SEVENZ%" a -t7z MediaSDK-Source-%OSTYPE%-%ARTIFACT_PRODUCTVERSION%.7z -r inc\ -xr!samples -xr!*.tlog "%SEVENZ%" u -t7z MediaSDK-Source-%OSTYPE%-%ARTIFACT_PRODUCTVERSION%.7z -r lib\ -xr!samples -xr!*.tlog "%SEVENZ%" u -t7z MediaSDK-Source-%OSTYPE%-%ARTIFACT_PRODUCTVERSION%.7z -r dll\ -xr!samples -xr!*.tlog popd
endlocal

@echo off setlocal
echo Adding version information to dlls and exes.
set SAMPLEDIR=%WORKSPACE%\samples set VERPATCH=%WORKSPACE%\verpatch\verpatch.exe set FILEVERSION=%MAJOR_NUMBER%.%MINOR_NUMBER%.%BUILD_NUMBER%.0 set PRODUCTVERSION=%FILEVERSION% set COPYRIGHT="Copyright (c), %DATE:~-4%. Advanced Micro Devices, Inc." set PRODUCTNAME="Media SDK"
for /r "%SAMPLEDIR%" %%G in (*.exe) do "%VERPATCH%" "%%~G" "%FILEVERSION%" /va /s FileDescription "%%~nxG" /s LegalCopyright %COPYRIGHT% /s ProductName %PRODUCTNAME% for /r "%SAMPLEDIR%" %%G in (*.exe) do "%VERPATCH%" "%%~G" /pv "%PRODUCTVERSION%"
for /r "%SAMPLEDIR%" %%G in (*.dll) do "%VERPATCH%" "%%~G" "%FILEVERSION%" /va /s FileDescription "%%~nxG" /s LegalCopyright %COPYRIGHT% /s ProductName %PRODUCTNAME% for /r "%SAMPLEDIR%" %%G in (*.dll) do "%VERPATCH%" "%%~G" /pv "%PRODUCTVERSION%"
endlocal

hudson.plugins.emailext.ExtendedEmailPub.defaultContent:
CAS Build System  |  Update preferences  |  Unsubscribe

Media SDK Package Notification

STATUS

The CAS Build System finished building the $PROJECT_NAME

Status: $BUILD_STATUS
BuildNumber: $MAJOR_NUMBER.$MINOR_NUMBER.$BUILD_NUMBER
Originator: $CAUSE
Changes: $CHANGES
Download URL: $JOB_URL
Build Console: $BUILD_URL/console

AMD | AMD Central
